Package org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn

Class AuthIdHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.AuthIdHelper
  • @Singleton
public class AuthIdHelper
extends Object
    Helper class to create and verify authentication JWTs.

    • Method Detail

      • createAuthId

        public String createAuthId​(LoginConfiguration loginConfiguration,
                           AuthenticationContext authContext)
                    throws SignatureException,
                           RestAuthException
        Creates a JWT authentication id.
        Parameters:
        loginConfiguration - The Login Configuration used in the login process.
        authContext - The underlying AuthContextLocal object.
        Returns:
        The authentication id JWT.
        Throws:
        SignatureException - If there is a problem signing or verifying the JWT.
        RestAuthException

      • reconstructAuthId

        public org.forgerock.json.jose.jws.SignedJwt reconstructAuthId​(String authId)
                                                        throws RestAuthException
        Reconstructs the Auth Id from a String to a JWT.
        Parameters:
        authId - The Auth Id jwt string
        Returns:
        The JWT object.
        Throws:
        RestAuthException

      • verifyAuthId

        public void verifyAuthId​(String realmDN,
                         String authId)
                  throws RestAuthException
        Verifies the signature of the JWT, to ensure the JWT is valid.
        Parameters:
        realmDN - The DN for the realm being authenticated against.
        authId - The authentication id JWT.
        Throws:
        RestAuthException
